English Translation: To jump on the bandwagon
This round is on me
The important thing is to take part
No more, no less

Spanish: Unas veces se gana, otras se pierde
English Translation: Sometimes you win, sometimes you lose
To fight for a lost cause
To throw in the towel
It's on me

Spanish: Cuando se cierra una puerta, se abre una ventana
English Translation: When one door closes, another opens

Spanish: Cada una tiene lo que se merece
English Translation: Everyone gets what they deserve
Curiosity killed the cat
To have connections

Spanish: No muerdas la mano que te da de comer
English Translation: Don't bite the hand that feeds you

Spanish: En casa del herrero, cuchillo de palo
English Translation: The shoemaker's son always goes barefoot

Spanish: Más vale lo malo conocido que lo bueno por conocer
English Translation: Better the devil you know than the devil you don't

Spanish: Cuando el gato no está, los ratones bailan
English Translation: When the cat's away, the mice will play
To be a weirdo
To be in the middle of nowhere
To be loaded
To kick the bucket
Like father, like son

Spanish: Matar dos pájaros de un tiro
English Translation: To kill two birds with one stone

Spanish: Ojos que no ven, corazón que no siente
English Translation: What the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over

Spanish: No es oro todo lo que reluce
English Translation: All that glitters is not gold
To be a nobody

Spanish: Las penas compartidas saben a menos
English Translation: A sorrow shared is a sorrow halved
To come out of the closet

Spanish: Es la gota que colma el vaso
English Translation: It's the straw that breaks the camel's back

Spanish: Sobre gustos no hay nada escrito
English Translation: There's no accounting for taste
To be as happy as a clam
